title: Stage Lv5-A2-S08
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: This research provides new insights to the academic community. (academic variant 1)
The practical implications is likely to help in policy formulation. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 이 연구는 학계에 새로운 통찰을 제공합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: This research provides new insights to the academic community. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 실무적 함의가 정책 수립에 도움이 될 것입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The practical implications is likely to help in policy formulation. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이론 발전에 기여할 수 있는 토대를 마련했습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We have established a foundation that may potentially contribute to theoretical development. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 향후 연구 방향을 제시하는 데 의의가 있습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: There appears to be significance in presenting future research directions. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 학제간 연구의 필요성을 부각시켰습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We have highlighted the necessity of interdisciplinary research. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 결과가 혁신적 접근법을 시사합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The research results suggest an innovative approach. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이 발견이 패러다임 전환을 촉진할 수 있습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: This discovery could facilitate a paradigm shift. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 실증적 증거를 통해 이론을 검증했습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We have validated the theory through empirical evidence. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구의 잠재적 응용 가능성이 광범위합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The potential applications of the research are extensive. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 학술적 논의를 한 단계 발전시켰습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We have advanced academic discourse by one step. (academic variant 1)
